sn14.18:1.2: “Mendicants, sentient beings join together and converge because of an element:
sn14.18:1.8: and the wise with the wise.
sn14.18:2.1: At present, too, sentient beings join together and converge because of an element. …
sn14.18:3.1: Sentient beings join together and converge because of an element:
sn14.18:3.7: and the wise with the wise.
sn14.18:3.8: (The following should be told in full like the first section.)
sn14.18:4.1: Sentient beings come together because of an element:
sn14.18:5.1: Sentient beings come together because of an element:
sn14.18:6.1: Sentient beings come together because of an element:
